ess-beta-metadata.label: Further education and skills learner achievements
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Count of learners aged 19 years and over achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim (with the exception of community learning and non-regulated Multiply aims)
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the count of learners achieving a funded further education and skills learning aim, with the exception of community learning, non-qualification parts of the Multiply programme and bootcamps, in England, for academic years 2018/19 to 2023/24.
